title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce estate tax rates by 20 percent, to increase the unified credit against estate and gift taxes to the equivalent of a $2,500,000 exclusion and to provide an inflation adjustment of such amount, and for other purposes.
content: Estate Tax Reduction Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) reduce estate tax rates, (2) repeal the phaseout of graduated rates. And (3) increase the unified credit to $2.5 million, with an inflation adjustment.
